testimonials.title: My Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from students who have transformed their communication skills and stage presence.

testimonial1.name: Iliana Peneva
testimonial1.text: This course is the perfect solution for anyone who wants to overcome their own limits and turn presenting into a pleasure.

testimonial2.name: Dinko Georgiev
testimonial2.text: The course was amazing! Pepe didn’t just teach techniques on how to perform successfully in front of an audience — he truly helped me apply them in a way that suited me and my needs. An extremely valuable and inspiring experience, I highly recommend it!

testimonial3.name: Ivan Danchev
testimonial3.text: Professionalism and a personal approach, delivered by Pepe in an informal setting. I recommend it.

testimonial4.name: Trifon Trifonov
testimonial4.text: I’ve learned practical, easy-to-use techniques for public speaking that help prepare both my body and my emotional mindset for addressing a large audience. With Peter’s guidance, I discovered the methods that work best for me, and they help me warm up and overcome the state of paralysis and stage fright.

testimonial5.name: Paola Petkova
testimonial5.text: The course came to me at exactly the right time, breaking myths, stepping out of my comfort zone, giving courage and strength to my voice and confidence.

testimonial6.name: Elena Ivanova
testimonial6.text: The voice techniques revolutionized my classroom presence. Even difficult students pay attention now.

testimonial7.name: Stefan Petrov
testimonial7.text: Board meetings used to stress me out. Now I command the room with natural confidence and clarity.

testimonial8.name: Kristina Todorova
testimonial8.text: The body language techniques helped me become more effective in interviews and team meetings.

testimonial9.name: Viktor Mihaylov
testimonial9.text: Client presentations are now my strength instead of my weakness. The ROI on this training is incredible.

testimonial10.name: Svetlana Nikolova
testimonial10.text: I finally feel authentic and confident when speaking. The fear is completely gone, replaced by excitement.

about.title: Who am I?
about.content: My name is Peter Stoyanov, and I’m an actor, clown, director, and (...well, I’m not a fan of the word "coach" – it sounds too wishy-washy to me...). For over 20 years, I’ve worked with people from various cultures and professions – from actors to business leaders – helping them free their voice, overcome stage fright, and connect more deeply with themselves and, through that, with their audience. I teach through games, exercises, improvisation, and physical work. My approach is practical, fun, and liberating.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: My name is Peter Stoyanov, and I'm an actor, clown, director, and communication coach. For over 20 years, I've worked with people from various cultures and professions – from actors to business leaders – helping them free their voice, overcome stage fright, and connect more deeply with themselves and, through that, with their audience.
journey.experience: With over two decades of experience spanning theater, education, and corporate training, I've discovered that the most powerful leaders are those who can communicate their vision with clarity, passion, and authenticity.
journey.background: My unique background as a professional actor and director gives me insights into the psychology of presence, the power of storytelling, and the art of connecting with any audience.
